attributes.action: Government to do more to help British Farming
attributes.additional_details:
We need to be maxamising the production of ur own food, whether it's milk, bread or fruit, the Government must ensure that Britain is working at maxmimum capacity when it comes to producing food for the British people.

Give subsidees to encourage farmers to grow crops that can be sold here in Great Britain.

We must first produce for ourselves, then we are doing all we can, can we export, or import food to help us even further!
